transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Pradeep ji very good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Pradeep ji Dharmendra baat kar raha hun India Mart ke office se.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Sir aapki ticket aayi hui thi India Mart pe bataye kya concern aa raha tha.
Customer: Mujhe apne account manager change karna tha.
Executive: Account manager change karna tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Kya issue ho gaya sir?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello response proper response proper nahi aa raha hai koi kuch bola tha to call back bhi nahi wapis se.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Aur mere mere working bhi abhi tak unke through kuch bhi nahi hui hai abhi tak.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai no issue main ye yahi ek concern hai main wo change kara du.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai main aapka account manager change karwa deta hun theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur baki sir hello.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Ha hamara jo concern to aapne 9696 pe call kiya tha to ticket open hui thi to main aapka account manager change karke aapke concern ko close kar du sir.
Customer: Ji kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir thank you sir.
Customer: Ek second.
Executive: Ha sir.
Customer: Bataye.
Customer: Ticket to close kar do lekin account manager change hona chahiye.
Executive: Sir account manager aapka change kara dunga kal aapko account new account manager call bhi aa jayega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Okay theek hai thank you. Aur thoda badhiya lagana ekdam fresh jo ho ekdam jo pura dhyan de.
Executive: Theek hai sure sir main uski jo experience bhi acha ho proper.
Executive: Theek hai sir dekho hum hum first time jude hai India Mart se do mahine hue hai mujhe abhi tak kuch bhi working nahi hui hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: To ekdam experience kisi ko lagaiyega.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Taki main aur usme upar wali aapki jo hai wo sakun.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To abhi tak India Mart pe kaisa conversion kaisa hai hamara?
Customer: Kuch bhi nahi hua abhi tak do mahine ho chuke hai mere ko ek bhi deal nahi hui meri aur jaise main proper sabke dekh raha hun main inquiry na mere paas koi call aa raha hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai main inko update karta hun aapko theek hai main account manager change kara ke.
Customer: Theek hai okay theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change account manager.

- No proper response from current account manager.

- No working done through current account manager.

- No deals closed in the last two months.



Resolution:

- Agreed to change the account manager.

- Assured a call from new account manager tomorrow.

- Assured to assign experienced account manager.

- Executive will update the team about the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will change account manager.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, change request, buyleads, subscription
